messages.messageBody:
megates@... wrote:

> From: megates@...
>
> Does everyone know about this on-line newsletter?
> Mary Ellen

I get it, and find it useful.

David Albert


--
John Taylor Gatto calls "And the Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in
Homeschooling and Community-Based Education" "a treat you should not
miss!" To read a sample chapter, reviewers' comments, or the foreword,
and to order (cheaper than Amazon, and I'll sign it for you too!), visit
my website at http://www.skylarksings.com

messages.messageBody:
Does everyone know about this on-line newsletter?
Mary Ellen
Snowflakes are on of nature's most fragile things,
but just look at what they can do
when they stick together.

Welcome to HEM ONLINE NEWS, a free monthly newsletter full of the
best internet resources, homeschooling news, announcements and
article excerpts, published by Home Education Magazine. For more
information on Home Education Magazine, see the end of this
newsletter or visit our web site at http://www.Home-Ed-Magazine.com
